actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress concerning the funeral of Imre Nagy, the former Prime Minister of Hungary, and other heroes of the 1956 revolution in Hungary.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the funeral of Imre Nagy and other heroes of the Hungarian revolution of 1956 is a significant symbol of reconciliation and reform in Hungary and expresses respect for Nagy and all of the martyrs of the revolution.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress concerning the funeral of Imre Nagy, the former Prime Minister of Hungary, and other heroes of the 1956 revolution in Hungary.
